rooms.description: A welcoming vestibule with integrated lighting and decorative Art Deco elements. The entrance aligns with Vastu principles for energy flow.
A spacious open-plan living area with Art Deco motifs and luxury finishes. It is designed to promote social interaction.
An elegant dining area adjacent to the living room. The layout respects Vastu by aligning with cardinal directions.
The master bedroom offers an expansive private retreat with en-suite bathroom and dedicated closet space. Decorative Art Deco detailing accentuates luxury.
A comfortable guest bedroom designed to accommodate visitors, incorporating Vastu principles for harmonious energy.
A functional second bedroom for additional family needs or as a home office, with Vastu guidelines integrated for productivity.
A versatile third bedroom that can be used as a study or additional guest room. Designed with Vastu principles for positive energy.
A dedicated home office space with ergonomic design and sound insulation. The layout considers Vastu principles for concentration.
A modern, well-equipped kitchen designed with Art Deco style and Vastu alignment for a harmonious cooking space.
The primary bathroom with luxury fixtures and Art Deco detailing. Vastu principles ensure good energy circulation.
A private bathroom adjoining the master bedroom with premium fixtures and Art Deco elegance.
A dedicated storage area integrated within the living spaces to optimize space in accordance with Vastu principles.
A functional utility room for laundry and other household appliances, designed with energy-efficient layouts.
A spacious balcony adjoining the master bedroom and living area for open-air relaxation, designed with Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: A grand entrance door designed with Art Deco motifs and energy-positive alignment.
Large bay windows in the living room for ample natural light and Vastu alignment.
A strategically placed window ensuring privacy and positive energy flow according to Vastu principles.
A soundproof door with Art Deco detailing ensuring functional separation and Vastu compliance.
A door leading to the balcony designed with Art Deco glass panels and Vastu principles for light.
